attributes.action: listen to the public,, you have been warned you will take another battering at the poles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we dont like being charged by the mile or the binful we dont like being ripped off with the price of fuel we dont have two jags or a bullet proof range rover paid for by the taxpayer we want free movement around our glorious country.we dont like being spied on we believe the police should be there to protect the public not there to protect the government against the ublic we want you to listen to us we are sick of being taken to the cleaners on our daily outgoings
